content: crochet these fun and practical whispering pines dishcloth pattern this is a beginner friendly pattern very quick to make with cotton great for crocheting in the summer months finished size 7 5 x 9 5 inches approx yarn rico creative cotton aran 92 yards in each color hook 5mm h/8 type of instructions this pattern has simple easy to follow written instructions and does not include any charts the pattern is written using american standard crochet terms delivery instant pdf download shop download crochet languages english only terms of use for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy all digital sales are final pattern support & questions email hellotrulycrochet at gmail com about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet shawl patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free version of my free pattern https //trulycrochet com/
